title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When I press Ok after setting the output location and classpath separately, I get the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The problem is that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the output location first, an illegal state is created.
EB: The setting of classpath and output location should be offered as one operation, similar to the validation that checks classpath and output location at once. Also, the error message should be improved. It should say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'
